tool_description: Spotify Data API for Millions of songs & podcasts, artists, albums, playlists and more.
name: Spotify_v3
title: Spotify

api_list.name: Get tracks
Album tracks
Album metadata
Artist overview
Top 200 songs by country / global

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: If weekly you must select a Thursday for it to work.

api_list.name: Top 20 by Monthly Listeners
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify81.p.rapidapi.com/top_20_by_monthly_listeners"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify81.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://spotify81.p.rapidapi.com/top_20_by_monthly_listeners"
